name: Lucas Fedders
about: I pride myself as a problem solver and a leader. One of my past jobs was a go-kart mechanic at Full Throttle, where I developed problem-solving skills by finding creative ways to fix the karts. I also play varsity soccer, which has shaped me into a leader for underclassmen players. Additionally, I am involved with Young Life, hosting about 60 underclassmen at my house and setting an example by performing skits for them.

experience.title: Mechanic
experience.company: Full Throttle Adrenaline Park & Event Center
experience.description: This was a summer job where I learned problem-solving and troubleshooting. I worked three days a week for 8 hours a day, fixing broken karts and performing routine checkups.

experience.title: Construction Worker
experience.description: My responsibilities included organizing contractors, working on small projects, ensuring project sites were clean, and taking drone photos of projects at various stages.
